structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIA. BIRD ROAD DESIGN AND INDUSTRIAL OVERLAY DISTRICT

text.section: The Bird Road Design and Industrial District (BRDI) Overlay District shall be applied only to those lands within the boundaries shown in the Figure 1 below. This area is generally located south of SW 40 Street (Bird Road), north of SW 48 Street, east of SW 74 Avenue and west of SW 70 Avenue.
